pullRequest.title: Test cases when attributes are set in all server.env, bootstrap.properties and server.xml
pullRequest.bodyText:
New test cases in logging FATs to test the scenario, when logging configurations are specified in both bootstrap.properties and server.xml.
server.xml takes precedence over bootstrap.properties once the server is started.

nodes.bodyText: The variable name "Server" should be in lowercase, to meet java standards. Maybe, rename it to something else, so it doesn't conflict with "server"?
